column4: is dontzap supposed to enable Ctrl+Alt+Backspace? I installed it but it still doesn't work
Ctrl+Alt+backspace still doesn't work after I tried "sudo dontzap --disable"
how do I get Ctrl+Alt+Backspace working again? I installed dontzap and ran "sudo dontzap --disable"
click ALT+CTRL+F1.  Then login.  Then run sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
